column2: The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology
column3: School of Engineering - Taught Postgraduate Programs
column5: The primary objective of this program is to equip participating students with a comprehensive and up-to-date knowledge based on the latest topics in wireless systems, optical networking, broadband multimedia communications, and convergence protocols.CurriculumStudents are required to complete a total of 30 credits of courses, including 6 credits of MSc Project. Subject to prior approval of the Program Director, students may take a maximum of 9 credits of courses offered by other MSc programs.  For details, please refer to the program website.A selection of
column7: 2024/25 Fall intake - Full-time students: HK$192,500 (~US$24,700) - paid in 2 installments - Part-time students: HK$168,300 (~US$21,600) - paid in 4 installments  For other fees, please visit the university website.
